io.micronaut.annotation.processing

Class JavaAnnotationMetadataBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.inject.annotation.AbstractAnnotationMetadataBuilder<javax.lang.model.element.Element,javax.lang.model.element.AnnotationMirror>
      • io.micronaut.annotation.processing.JavaAnnotationMetadataBuilder

  • public class JavaAnnotationMetadataBuilder
extends AbstractAnnotationMetadataBuilder<javax.lang.model.element.Element,javax.lang.model.element.AnnotationMirror>
    A AnnotationMetadata for builder for Java to be used at compile time.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
